page.title: 02SHIELDAIG PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: THERE ARE ELEVEN CHILDREN IN OUR SCHOOL. WE HAVE ONLY ONE TEACHER AND ALL AGES IN ONE ROOM. WE HAVE TWO CLASSROOMS. ONE WE WORK IN AND ONE WE PLAY IN. WE START SCHOOL AT HALF-PAST NINE AND GO HOME AT HALF PAST THREE. WE HAVE TWO PLAY TIMES. THE SCHOOLHOUSE AND KITCHEN ARE JOINED TO THE SCHOOL. THERE IS A HATCH THROUGH TO THE KITCHEN WHERE JEAN THE COOK PASSES THROUGH ALL WE NEED FOR LUNCH. AFTER WE HAVE SAID GRACE, JEAN PUTS OUT THE LUNCH. TWO CHILDREN SERVE. WE HAVE AN OPEN AIR SWIMMING POOL AND PORTA-CABIN FOR CHANGING AT THE BACK OF THE SCHOOL, BUT WE CAN ONLY USE THIS IN SUMMER. I LIKE WEDNESDAYS ESPECIALLY, BECAUSE WE HAVE P.E. AND ART.
